original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyaḥ sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodha ārāme

original: Atha kho candano devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ nigrodhārāmaṁ
analyzed: atha kho candanaḥ deva puttaḥ abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkanta vaṇṇaḥ kevala kappam nigrodha ārāma

original: obhāsetvā yenāyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: obhāsetvā yena ayasmā lomasakaṅgiyo tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho candano devaputto āyasmantaṁ lomasakaṅgiyaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho candanaḥ deva puttaḥ āyasmantam lomasakaṅgiyam etat avoca
dhāresi tva bhikkhu bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca ati

original: “Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
analyzed: na kho aha āvuso dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca

original: Tvaṁ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā”ti?
analyzed: tvam pana āvuso dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca ati

original: “Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
analyzed: aham pi kho bhikkhu na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca

original: Dhāresi pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā”ti?
analyzed: dhāresi pana tva bhikkhu bhaddekarattiyaḥ gāthā ti

original: “Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
analyzed: na kho aha āvuso dhāremi bhaddekarattiyaḥ gāthā
tvam pana āvuso dhāresi bhaddekarattiyaḥ gāthā ati
dhāremi kho aha bhikkhu bhaddekarattiyaḥ gāthā ati

original: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, āvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā”ti?
analyzed: yathā katham pana tvam āvuso dhāresi bhaddekarattiyaḥ gāthā ati

original: “Ekamidaṁ, bhikkhu, samayaṁ bhagavā devesu tāvatiṁsesu viharati pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṁ.
analyzed: ekam ida bhikkhu samayam bhagavā devesu tāvatisesu viharati pāricchattaka mūle paṇḍu kambala silāya

original: Tatra bhagavā devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca abhāsi:
analyzed: tatra bhagavā devānam bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca abhāsi

original: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhikkhu, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
analyzed: evam kho aha bhikkhu dhāremi bhaddekarattiyaḥ gāthā

original: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
analyzed: uggaṇhāhi tva bhikkhu bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca

original: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
analyzed: pariyāpuṇāhi tva bhikkhu bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca

original: dhārehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
analyzed: dhārehi tva bhikkhu bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca

original: Atthasaṁhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako”ti.
analyzed: attha sahitaḥ bhikkhu bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādi brahmacariyako ti

original: Atha kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo tassā rattiyā accayena senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyaḥ tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena senāsanam sasāmetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena sāvatthi tena cārikam pakkāmi

original: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena sāvatthi jetavanaṁ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo yena bhagavā
analyzed: anupubbena cārikam caramānaḥ yena sāvatthi jetavanam anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmaḥ yena bhagavā

original: tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ
analyzed: tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamanta

original: nisinno kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “Ekamidāhaṁ, bhante, samayaṁ sakkesu viharāmi kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
analyzed: ekam id āha bhante samayam sakkesu viharāmi kapilavatthusmim nigrodha ārāme

original: Atha kho, bhante, aññataro devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ
analyzed: atha kho bhante aññataraḥ deva puttaḥ abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkanta vaṇṇaḥ kevala kappa

original: nigrodhārāmaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ
analyzed: nigrodha ārāmam obhāsetvā yena aham tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi ekamanta

original: ṭhito kho, bhante, so devaputto maṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ kho bhante saḥ deva puttaḥ mam etat avoca
dhāresi tva bhikkhu bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, taṁ devaputtaṁ etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte aha bhante tam deva puttam etat avoca

original: ‘na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
analyzed: na kho aha āvuso dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca

original: Tvaṁ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā’ti?
analyzed: tvam pana āvuso dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca ati

analyzed: aham pi kho bhikkhu na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca

original: Dhāresi pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā’ti?
analyzed: dhāresi pana tva bhikkhu bhaddekarattiyaḥ gāthā ti

analyzed: na kho aha āvuso dhāremi bhaddekarattiyaḥ gāthā
tvam pana āvuso dhāresi bhaddekarattiyaḥ gāthā ati
dhāremi kho aha bhikkhu bhaddekarattiyaḥ gāthā ati

original: ‘Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, āvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā’ti?
analyzed: yathā katham pana tvam āvuso dhāresi bhaddekarattiyaḥ gāthā ati

original: ‘Ekamidaṁ, bhikkhu, samayaṁ bhagavā devesu tāvatiṁsesu viharati pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṁ.
analyzed: ekam ida bhikkhu samayam bhagavā devesu tāvatisesu viharati pāricchattaka mūle paṇḍu kambala silāya

original: Tatra kho bhagavā devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca abhāsi:
analyzed: tatra khalu bhagavā devānam bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca abhāsi

original: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhikkhu, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
analyzed: evam kho aha bhikkhu dhāremi bhaddekarattiyaḥ gāthā

original: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
analyzed: uggaṇhāhi tva bhikkhu bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca

original: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
analyzed: pariyāpuṇāhi tva bhikkhu bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca

original: dhārehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
analyzed: dhārehi tva bhikkhu bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca

original: Atthasaṁhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako’ti.
analyzed: attha sahitaḥ bhikkhu bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādi brahmacariyako ti
idam avoca bhante saḥ deva putto

original: Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca desetū”ti.
analyzed: sādhu me bhante bhagavā bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca desetu uti
jānāsi pana tva bhikkhu tam deva puttanti

original: “Na kho ahaṁ, bhante, jānāmi taṁ devaputtan”ti.
analyzed: na kho aha bhante jānāmi tam deva puttan ti
candanaḥ nāma saḥ bhikkhu deva putto

original: Candano, bhikkhu, devaputto aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasikatvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṁ suṇāti.
analyzed: candanaḥ bhikkhu deva puttaḥ aṭṭhim katvā manasikatvā sabba cetasā samannāharitvā ohita sotaḥ dhammam suṇāti

original: Tena hi, bhikkhu, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi bhikkhu suṇāhi sādhukam manasi karohi bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyaḥ bhagavataḥ paccassosi
kathañca bhikkhu atītam na anvāgameti pe
evam kho bhikkhu atītam na anvāgameti
kathañca bhikkhu anāgatam na paṭikaṅkhati pe
evam kho bhikkhu anāgatam na paṭikaṅkhati
kathañca bhikkhu paccuppannesu dhammesu sahīrati pe

original: evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu saṁhīrati.
analyzed: evam kho bhikkhu paccuppannesu dhammesu sahīrati

original: Kathañca, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati …pe…
analyzed: kathañca bhikkhu paccuppannesu dhammesu na sahīrati pe

original: evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati.
analyzed: evam kho bhikkhu paccuppannesu dhammesu na sahīrati

original: Attamano āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: atta manaḥ āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti
lomasa kaṅgiya bhadda ekaratta suttam niṭṭhitam catuttha
